import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './messaging.css'; import MessagePreview from './MessagePreview'; import WriteMessage from './WriteMessage'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' class MessageBoxModal extends Component { render() { const sampleMessage = { name: "Michael Douglas", email: "michael.douglas@gmail.com", subject: "New Ideas", innerText: "This is a sample message testing the contents and display ability of our messaging dialogue" } if (this.props.messages) { const messages = this.props.messages.map(message => { console.log return message }) } return (
Messaging
Name Email Subject Preview Options
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ messages: state.user.messages }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {})(MessageBoxModal);
